TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ModelDataSource extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IDataSource, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager

Docs.summary: The data source control used by data-bound controls to perform CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations when model binding is in use.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Occurs when model binding is in use and data methods are being called.
Gets the data-bound control that is using this control as a data source when model binding is in use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed

Docs.summary: Loads the previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.returns: Returns the control's current view state; otherwise, returns , if there is no view state associated with the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

Docs.summary: Tracks view-state changes to the control so that they can be stored in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method can be overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the view state for the object.
